armGroups.label: Immersive Virtual Reality
armGroups.description: Participants will undergo a 20-minute session with immersive VR experience: theBlu (WEVR, Inc, Venice, California, USA) delivered via Oculus Rift headset. This immersive experience simulates the participant observing naturally relaxing and dynamic environment of a coral reef.
interventionNames: DEVICE: Immersive Virtual Reality - theBlu via Oculus Rift

armGroups.label: Non-immersive 2D Control
armGroups.description: Participants will undergo a 20-minute session with non-immersive two-dimensional mimic: Recording of theBlu experience delivered via video on a non-immersive 2-D Asus tablet.

armGroups.label: VR Sensory Deprivation Control
armGroups.description: Participants will undergo a 20-minute session with VR sensory deprivation: delivered via a blank (ie, content-less) Oculus Rift headset to control for the external sensory deprivation of the VR system.
interventionNames: DEVICE: VR Sensory Deprivation - blank Oculus Rift headset

interventions.name: Immersive Virtual Reality - theBlu via Oculus Rift
interventions.description: 20-minute immersive VR experience using theBlu (WEVR, Inc) delivered via Oculus Rift headset. This simulates observing a naturally relaxing and dynamic coral reef environment.

interventions.name: Non-immersive 2D tablet - theBlu video
interventions.description: 20-minute session viewing a recording of the theBlu experience delivered via video on a non-immersive 2-D Asus tablet.

interventions.name: VR Sensory Deprivation - blank Oculus Rift headset
interventions.description: 20-minute session with a blank (content-less) Oculus Rift headset to control for external sensory deprivation effects of the VR system.
